label: logicA:education_en
steps: [1] If the literacy curriculum includes daily phonics instruction, then the class develops basic decoding skills.
[2] If the class develops basic decoding skills, then the class can read simple texts independently.
[3] For every student x, if x attends the after-school tutoring sessions, then x improves their assessment scores.
[4] Student Alex attends the after-school tutoring sessions.
[5] The literacy curriculum includes daily phonics instruction.
[6] Therefore, the class develops basic decoding skills.
[7] Therefore, the class can read simple texts independently.
[9] Therefore, the class can read simple texts independently and Alex's assessment scores improve.
